definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
sharp image/clear-cut/in bold outline/in sharp relief

sentences.english: We have to get the thickness of the outline to match the thickness of the tree and cloud lines.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經取得的厚度輪廓匹配厚度的樹和雲線。

sentences.english: The support tube profile will be extruded to this surface.
sentences.chinese: 支撐細管輪廓將被擠出至此曲面。

sentences.english: Daisy took her face in her hands as if feeling its lovely shape.
sentences.chinese: 黛西把她的臉埋在手中，好象在感覺那嬌好的輪廓。

sentences.english: Low profile design, simple fashion, ultra-thin design, convenient operation.
sentences.chinese: 低輪廓設計，簡約時尚，超薄型設計，操作方便。

sentences.english: Shadows on the hills, sketch the trees and the daffodils.
sentences.chinese: 山上的陰影，襯托出樹和水仙的輪廓。

sentences.english: The calculated field data are applied to reconstruct the contour projections of the scatterer successfully.
sentences.chinese: 計算結果用於散射體輪廓的投影重建獲得成功。

sentences.english: The schoolgirl developed long legs, her jawline changed, she had her hair cut.
sentences.chinese: 她雙腿變得修長，下巴輪廓變了，頭髮也剪短了。

sentences.english: As you use it, facial contours appear sculpted and newly defined.
sentences.chinese: 當你使用它，出現面部輪廓雕塑和新定義。

sentences.english: Using the method of fractal geometry to describe the profile of grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 並用分形幾何的方法描述砂輪表面輪廓形貌。

sentences.english: The arm should be held at the same level and the outlines of the acromioclavicular joints should be the same.
sentences.chinese: 手臂應保持在相同水平而肩鎖關節輪廓也應相同。

sentences.english: A line or fillable with an outline that is drawn greater than one pixel wide is a thick shape.
sentences.chinese: 超過一個像素值的線條或者勾畫出的粗輪廓。

sentences.english: The silhouette of a costume is its overall outline or contour.
sentences.chinese: 廓形是一件衣服的外輪廓線或者剪影。

sentences.english: We proposed a novel recognition method for the pressed characters based on the mixed outline features.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於混合輪廓特徵的壓印字符識別新方法。

sentences.english: Its high shrink rate makes it perfect for use on contoured containers.
sentences.chinese: 其高收縮率使它適合使用的輪廓容器。

sentences.english: Cloud ah, gently wafted, a dream that came out a little bit outline.
sentences.chinese: 雲啊，輕輕飄過來，夢中輪廓一點點透露出來。

sentences.english: It introduces a new kind of generating method of non-equidistant curves.
sentences.chinese: 提出了直紋面葉輪葉片非等距輪廓線的生成方法。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to polish (a written piece)/to qualify or modify (grammar)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
